1. Load about:config
2. Type "codebase".
3. Double-click in the large white area.

Result: Some pref in the list gets twiddled, even though I didn't click on it.

comments.text:
1.) I confirm the described issue on FF 39.0 on Windows 7 64 bit (FF is not 64 bit, it is the regular offered windows download)

2.) This is probably related:
If one filters the config items to be less than fits on the page (for example 10 items), then the following problem happens with boolean items:
 - double click on the last item: it is changed and moved to the top of the list
 - double click on the new last item: the first item is toggled (and put back to the end of the list) instead of the last one (the one under the pointer)

This happens if the second double click is done right after the first one.
